column1: Someone or something that is extremely offensive or unacceptable
To do something to show that you remember and respect someone important or an important event in the past
An expression of very strong disapproval of someone or something especially something you think is morally wrong
Someone who is treacherous cannot be trusted because they are not loyal and secretly intend to harm you
Someone who is zealous does or supports something with great energy
Likely to forget things especially because you are thinking about something else
The belief that animals or objects have the same feelings and qualities as humans
To punish someone by no longer allowing them to be a member of the Roman Catholic church
An unusual habit or way of behaving that someone has
The deliberate killing of a person who is very ill and going to die in order to stop them suffering
Not leaning to one side or the other but exactly vertical
A serious mental illness in which someone’s thoughts and feelings are not based on what is really happening around them
The practice of doing medical or scientific tests on live animals
A state similar to sleep in which someone’s thoughts and actions can be influenced by someone else
To make someone stop feeling angry
Giving careful attention to what is happening so that you will notice any danger or illegal activity
Someone who publicly criticizes the government in a country where this is punished
Someone who is versatile has many different skills
An object that is sturdy is strong well-made and not easily broken
Worried or nervous about something that you are going to do or about the future
